page.title: 17Future Sports Hall.
page.content: In about two years time Tenbury Council are going to build a sports hall on the Palmers Meadow.They are going to build it either on to the swimming pool wall or in line with it.Some of the sports they are going to have are{five aside football}and {hockey}one{tennis court}and three {badminton courts, volleyball}and {trampolining.}They are going to get money to build this from jumble sales, fetes,discos,the carnivals and other functions.On the Burgage they are going to change the grass{tennis courts to hard courts. Sports at schools_at the high school in Tenbury the sports that they have are{rugby, hockey, football, golf, {netball, rounders, cricket, tennis, {athletics}and{camping in Wales.}In our school the sports that we play are {rounders, hockey, football.
